item.description:
The Danforth will be closed on Saturday due to the snowstorm.  Sorry.  I will reschedule this soon.

 

bests,

-rsr-

Ron

 

I may not be able to make this?  Is anyone else available to host this?

 

Come join the Greater Boston Divorced and Separated Support meetup for this museum event.

this is a child-friendly event.   Bring your kids or grandkids, or great grandkids, nieces, nephews, etc.   bring a friend's child.

Current exhibitions: http://www.danforthmuseum.org/exhibits.html

Adult admission: $11

Seniors: $9

Students $8

Children under 17: Free

 

Free admission to Members of the following organizations:
• AAM (The American Association of Museums)
• TCAN (The Center for the Arts in Natick)
• ICOM (International Council of Museums)
• Framingham Co-Operative Bank Club Advantage
• All students and faculty of Framingham State College
• All students and faculty of Massachusetts College of Art & Design

Free admission to Members of the following Museums:
• Art Complex Museum (Duxbury, MA)
• Bennington Museum (VT)
• Cape Cod Museum of Art (MA)
• Farnsworth Art Museum (Rockland, ME)
• Fitchburg Art Museum (MA)
• Lyman Allan Museum of Art (New London, CT)
• Mattatuck Museum (Waterbury, CT)
• New Britain Museum of American Art (CT)
• Provincetown Art Association and Museum (MA)

Members of NEMA (New England Museum Association):
• Free Admission or $1.00 off Guest Admission

Members of MTA (Massachusetts Teacher Association) and AAA (American Automobile Association):
• $1.00 off Single Admission

Members of WGBH, WUMB, and the HR Consortium of MA Cultural Institutions:
• Buy One Admission, Get One Free or $1.00 Single Admission
item.name: Cancelled - Museum closed/weather - Danforth Museum of Art (kid friendly event)
